price: Na wao husema: Mola wetu Mlezi! Tuletee upesi sehemu yetu ya adhabu kabla ya Siku ya Hisabu.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
footnotes: Na makafiri husema kwa kejeli: Mola wetu Mlezi! Tuhimizie sehemu yetu ya adhabu kabla ya Siku ya Malipo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmi al-ḥisābi
